transcript:
Customer: ha akram ali sir wo post drop ho gayi thi.
Executive: kaam change ye din jo sara kar liya aapne?
Customer: ji ji ji nahi aur thoda bacha hai.
Executive: check karu mai?
Executive: minute verify shayad nahi hua hai sir email id.
Customer: email id wahi change kar raha hu.
Executive: ha wo change kar lijiye mobile number abhi email id ka password hai hi.
Customer: important main primary id ho sakta hu bol email id bolo.
Customer: sahi sahi folding hmm.
Customer: nine.
Customer: @gmail.com.

Customer: mail ko aata tha dekh email ho.
Customer: change karna tha.
Executive: change kar lijiye password likh ke rakh lijiye pehle closer bhejunga usi pe jayega aapke paas.


Customer: 1400.

Customer: password likh ke rakh le abhi ke liye fir ko mai bhul nahi kya rakhhenge ki nahi rakhho.
Customer: idhar hi rakhunga.
Customer: hmm okay boliye ji aap.
Executive: ha sir ho gaya na matlab changes ho gaya na mail id ka abhi.
Customer: hmm hmm.
Executive: theek hai ek bar rukiye mai check kar leta hu.
Customer: i am insta kya hai ji.
Executive: sir i am insta apna aapke kaam ka nahi hai matlab hai i am insta kya hai ki matlab whatsapp.
Executive: ka feature keh sakte ho ek hai jo aapke is pe align ho jayega matlab aap simple words me samjhau ki agar buyer search karta hai na koi product man lijiye isko folding search kiya ho aur suppliers ka agar naam aata hai sir hai na suppliers ke naam hi to aate hai jab iska folding search karega to supplier ke naam aa jayenge to usme kya hoga aap agar i am insta services lete ho to aap wale me na ek option aur extra aa jayega waise kya dikhta hai ki call karo ya inquiry dalo tisra option kya hoga beech me ki whatsapp bhi kar payega aapko whatsapp ka option aane lagega aapke aapke aap wale page pe theek hai mobile site jab open karenge na to aapme whatsapp ka bhi option aayega kyuki bahut sare buyer ko na lagta hai ki easy hai whatsapp pe conversation karna hai na.
Customer: hmm.
Executive: theek hai to whatsapp icon waha pe aa jayega isse kya hoga easy ho jayega aapke liye matlab direct whatsapp whatsapp pe aa jayega lekin wo aapke lekin wo aapka whatsapp integrate nahi hoga sir.
Customer: hmm.
Executive: aapka whatsapp integrate nahi hoga wo india mart ka jo number hai na pns number uske through hi wo aayega aap lead manager se aap reply karoge uske whatsapp pe jayega wo apne whatsapp se jab message karega na to aapke lead manager me aayega sir reply samjhe aap samne wale ko samne wale buyer ko aisa nahi lagega ki matlab aap kahin se aur se reply kar rahe ho 0983 hmm hai na to wo ek tarike ka feature hai ki aapke page pe ek whatsapp ka feature bhi add ho jata hai jisse kai bar buyer ko easy lagta hai ki connect karne ke liye do iska koi relation hai nahi wo jo badh ke aap chah rahe ho na ki lead aaye aur inquiry aaye to aur business badhane ke liye wo waisa nahi hai business thoda isse badh sakta hai ki buyer aapko matlab easy rehta hai na whatsapp conversation karna kisi buyer ke liye to wo feature hai lekin wo bhi costly hai aapka wo 40000 plus gst ka hai ek saal ka.
Customer: sahi baat hai.
Executive: ha lekin sir maine aapko plan jo aapko jarurat ke hisab se mai mere hisab se preferred star wala hi suitable hai but agar aap kahoge to agar category badhani hai jaise aapne i am star 10 ki do category li hui hai.
Customer: waise category badhwa sakte hai.
Executive: i am star 10 jaise abhi aapne le rakhi hai na do category hmm to do category aur aur le sakte hai aur kya to usme leads bhi badh jayegi aapki.
Customer: do me kya rehta hai.
Executive: hmm hmm hmm kitna padega ji.
Executive: sir sir ek ruko usme padega na category leni kaun si hai i am star 10 aapne top top lock iska folding system le rakha hai theek hai sir iska folding props jack le rakha hai to ab kaun sa lenge centering sheets hai adjust
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to change email ID.

- Customer asks about I am Insta feature.

- Customer asks about the cost of additional categories.



Resolution:

- Executive changed the customer's email ID.

- Executive explained I am Insta feature.

- Executive informed about the cost of additional categories.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- email id, i am insta, categories, subscription
